title: FTP Sensitive Data Leak
description: Exploit a misconfigured FTP server to discover sensitive information.
hints: Connect to the FTP server using anonymous login.
Explore the directories for misplaced sensitive files.
The flag is in a file that is not typically meant to be publicly accessible.
learningObjectives: Understand the risks of misconfigured FTP servers.
Learn to identify and explore accessible directories.
Practice using FTP clients for exploration and data retrieval.
